question: The "Operation Red Dog" happened in which country?
explanation: The Operation Red Dog was an unauthorised military expedition into the island country of Dominica, officially the Commonwealth of Dominica, in the Eastern Caribbean Sea, part of the Windwards Islands of the Lesser Antilles Archipelago, by the Canadian and American supporters of white supremacist and Ku Klux Klan groups to overthrow the Government of Dominica headed by Eugenia Charles and replace her with Patrick John to power. This military plot happened in 1981. This plot was busted with the help of United States federal agents.
